head.title: Learning TurboGears 2.3: Information about TG and WSGI

meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for Linux/x86 (vers 11 February 2007), see www.w3.org

body.h2: The WSGI nature of the framework
body.p: In this page you can see all the WSGI variables your request object has, the ones in capital letters are required by the spec, then a sorted by component list of variables provided by the Components, and at last the "wsgi." namespace with very useful information about your WSGI Server
